Showers early then partly cloudy overnight PERIOD Low around 50F PERIOD Winds S at  to  mph PERIOD Chance of rain  PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Arizonas Jeff Van Houten went  and was a double shy of hitting for the cycle  while Washington starter Trevor Gibson didnt make it out of the first inning  as the Wildcats topped the Huskies  Sunday PERIOD

The Husky offense scored four runs in the top of the first inning off Wildcat pitcher Joe Little only to watch its early lead crumble PERIOD Husky freshman Brent Lillibridge led off the game with a solo shot to center PERIOD Centerfielder Mike Wagner followed with a runscoring base hit and Nick Batkoski extended the Washington advantage with a tworun single PERIOD

The Wildcats unfazed by the fourrun outburst cut the lead in half in the bottom of the inning PERIOD Following a sacrifice fly from Derek Decater Van Houten tripled home another run  sending Gibson to the bench after only  pitches PERIOD

Unfortunately for the Huskies their relief pitching could not contain Van Houten PERIOD Two innings later Van Houten stepped up to the plate and gave the Wildcats the lead with a threerun homer  his ninth roundtripper of the year  off of UW lefty Trent Baysinger PERIOD

While Washingtons relief pitching resulted in more Wildcat productivity Arizonas John Meloan and Kevin Guyette did not allow another Husky run across home combining for eight scoreless innings PERIOD

 said UW coach Ken Knutson PERIOD 

Meloan who has not recorded a loss this season fanned seven batters on his way to earning his third victory of the season PERIOD Baysinger  suffered his first loss of the year for the Huskies PERIOD

Wagner and Lillibridge who got two hits each turned in the best offensive performances for the Huskies PERIOD

With the loss the Huskies fall to  overall and  in conference play while Arizona improves to  overall and  in Pac10 action PERIOD

Arizona recorded its first win of the series on Saturday as the Wildcats dominated the Huskies  PERIOD UA tied the game at  in the third and held the advantage with the aid of a threerun fourth and a fourrun sixth PERIOD Lillibridge finished threeforthree in the UW trouncing PERIOD

Washington opened the series with a win however  a  victory that came in an 11inning battle PERIOD A ChadBoudon home run  his teamleading eleventh of the year  tied the matchup at  while Justin Drake scored from first on an errant Arizona pickoff attempt to snag the extrainning win PERIOD

The Huskies conclude their fivegame roadtrip in Manhattan Kan. with two nonleague contests against Kansas State PERIOD
